S3OutputLocation.description: The Amazon Simple Storage (S3) bucket URI

KmsKeyId.description: The KMS key id used for encryption on the S3 bucket

Tag.description: Key-value pair to associate as a tag for the resource

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The key value of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Description.description: Description for the edge device fleet
Description.markdownDescription:
Description for the edge device fleet

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 800  

Pattern: [\S\s]+  

Update requires: No interruption

DeviceFleetName.description: The name of the edge device fleet
DeviceFleetName.markdownDescription:
The name of the edge device fleet

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 63  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*_*[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  

Update requires: No interruption

OutputConfig.description: S3 bucket and an ecryption key id (if available) to store outputs for the fleet
OutputConfig.markdownDescription:
S3 bucket and an ecryption key id (if available) to store outputs for the fleet

---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: Role associated with the device fleet
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
Role associated with the device fleet

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z\-]*:iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption
